ComicInfo.Series: Burn the Orphanage: Reign of Terror
ComicInfo.Summary:
The epic, oversized conclusion of Reign of Terror is here! Rock, Bear, Lex, and their allies go toe-to-toe with the foes at MannCorp. Are they strong enough to survive? This finale is not to be missed!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|----------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Sina Grace | 1 | | B | Cover B | Seth Damoose & S. Steven Struble | 2 |
